original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-09 19:58:29' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-4 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.ViewCount<=5977 AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=11 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-01-25 08:31:41' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation<=312 AND u.DownVotes<=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 19:58:29'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -4 AND (CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) <= 5977) AND posts.AnswerCount <= 4 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 11) AND posts.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-01-25 08:31:41'
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation <= 312 AND users.DownVotes <= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E6.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E6E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E3E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E6E3E4.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E3E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E6E3E4E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E6E3E4E5.Id)
